remarks: Version of ~ bj-vexw with a dv condition, which does not require ~ ax-13 .  The degenerate instance of ~ bj-vexw is a simple consequence of ~ abid .  (Contributed by BJ, 13-Jun-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
bj-vexwv.1 $e |- ph $.
bj-vexwv $p |- y e. { x | ph } $.
